Body: Whenever there is an app from Google Inc in the Android market, I am uncomfortable with their permission levels: Why do they always need read/write permissions to personal data/contacts and all our personal stuff?Even though I believe Google, I am not interested in sharing my personal data with them. Can something be done -- like, limiting the permissions?
Title: Why does Google always need personal data?

history.Text: Whenever there is an app from Google Inc in the android market, i am uncomfortable with their permission levels? why do they always need read/write permissions to personal data/contacts and all our personal stuff!! Even though i believe google, i am not interested in sharing my personal data with them. Can something be done? like, limiting the permissions?
Why does google always need personal data? Its Annoying

Whenever there is an app from *Google Inc* in the Android market, I am uncomfortable with their permission levels: Why do they always need read/write permissions to personal data/contacts and all our personal stuff?! Even though I believe google, I am not interested in sharing my personal data with them. Can something be done -- like, limiting the permissions?
